definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: And you, didn't you notice it?
sentences.chinese: 你呢，你也没有注意号头？

sentences.english: Dan I have your name and room number, please?
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我您的名字及房间号头？

sentences.english: May I also have your room number, please?
sentences.chinese: 我可以问一下您的房间号头吗？

sentences.english: May I have your name and room number?
sentences.chinese: 您能告诉我您的名儿与房间号头吗？

sentences.english: Dan you give me your fax number, sir?
sentences.chinese: 请您告诉我您的传真号头好吗？

definition: first letter of a word or serial number/first character of a Chinese word/first digit of a number/the top part (esp. a radical) of a Chinese character/the initial of a Chinese syllable
shill/tout/phony customer who pretends to buys things so as to lure real customers
percussion instrument used by street peddlers, barbers etc to attract attention
short note/slip of paper/stripe/(slang) cop/(old) prostitute
